prefixes.title: fix
prefixes.description: Bug fix. Correlates with PATCH in SemVer

prefixes.title: feat
prefixes.description: New feature. Correlates with MINOR in SemVer

prefixes.title: docs
prefixes.description: Changes to documentation or code comments

prefixes.title: style
prefixes.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (e.g. formatting)

prefixes.title: refactor
prefixes.description: Changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature

prefixes.title: test
prefixes.description: Changes that add missing or corrects existing tests

prefixes.title: build
prefixes.description: Changes to the build system or external dependencies

prefixes.title: ci
prefixes.description: Changes to CI/CD configuration files or scripts
